Other Policy - Description (1): ACHD's Healthy Equity and Strategic Initiatives division organized a Healthy Meeting Policy workgroup and conducted two meetings in November and December. We will be piloting a Healthy Meeting Policy in the Health Department with plans to make it county wide.
Social Media Reach: The PowerPoint presentation was presented to two community based organizations. Number of attendees unknown.
Local Coalitions - Additional Informatio: ACHD's Project Lead continues to keep ACHD's Youth Healthy Advisory Council informed about HBP activities.
